channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Eli Lilly Is Gaining on Novo Nordisk in the Obesity Race
item.description: Despite a late start, the advantage is shifting toward the U.S. company.

item.title: Space stocks set to climb, boosted by Virgin Galactic and Rocket Lab results
item.description: Rocket Lab reported a 71% revenue jump when it reported second-quarter results Thursday.

item.title: Super Mario Is Winning the Console Wars
item.description: Nintendo is close to updating its popular Switch console. Unlike Sony and Microsoft, it can take its time with powerful new features.

item.title: 20 stocks the bears can’t easily short — and that’s why you shouldn’t buy them
item.description: Companies that short-sellers struggle to bet against — like Super Micro Computer — are likely overvalued.

item.title: Don't Bet on a Rapid Drop in Mortgage Rates
item.description: Several market forces could keep them elevated for some time.

item.title: Perrigo voluntarily recalls 16,500 cans of baby formula because of excessive levels of vitamin D
item.description: For most infants, short-term consumption of the affected formula is unlikely to cause harm. But in a small subset of infants, such as those with impaired renal function, there is “the potential that consumption of the recalled product could result in health complications,” a statement said.

item.title: Nasdaq to Tighten Listing Rules for Penny Stocks
item.description: The exchange has come under pressure for allowing risky companies to remain listed through reverse stock splits.

item.title: This strategist downgraded tech just before the summer swoon. Now he says buy and here’s why.
item.description: This analyst downgraded tech before the slide and now he says buy

item.title: S&P 500 Jumps 2.3% in Best Day Since 2022
item.description: The stock benchmark posted its best day since November 2022 after a better-than-expected jobless claims report helped ease fears that the labor market is weakening.

item.title: ‘He doesn’t want to help’: My mother took out a student loan during her marriage. Is my stepfather on the hook?
